author: @iceslim01
text: Hey man I watched some of your videos but I haven't watched all of the matplotlib ones. Was wondering if you knew a way to easily poll for the current day's OHLCV data, at any time during the actual open trading session. What I've been doing is downloading the yahoo 1d, putting each line into the array, adding all the volumes together, then writing the OHLC data plus the combined volume to the last line of a file, but it's INSANE slow, like 30+ minutes for 5000 tickers. I'm using the pandas get_data_yahoo and matplotlib and yahoo_historical in some other ways but they also only seem to get data from yesterday and backwards. Any ideas?
